import {Component, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {Meal} from "./model/meal"; import {Router} from "@angular/router"; import {FormBuilder} from '@angular/forms'; import {MainPanelService} from "./service/main-panel.service"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.css'] }) export class AppComponent implements OnInit { meals!: Meal[]; checkoutForm = this.formBuilder.group({ name: '', address: '' }); constructor(private mainPanelService: MainPanelService, private router: Router, private formBuilder: FormBuilder) { } ngOnInit() { this.getMeals(); } private getMeals() { this.mainPanelService.getMeals().subscribe(data => { this.meals = data; }) } }
